document_data.name: Solemn Duty
document_data.Description: The katana's blade was perfectly sharp, allowing its wielder to easily decapitate foes. The words "Solemn Duty" were etched into the blade, and the hilt was engraved with markings.
document_data.Powers: As indiciated by the engravings on its hilt, ''Solemn Duty'' was [[item enchantment|enchanted]] to be especially powerful against inhabitants of the [[outer planes]]. Furthermore, it was enchanted to keep the wielder focused and free from confusion.
document_data.History: The actual origin of ''Solemn Duty'' was a mystery. In [[1281 DR]], it was in the possession of the [[drow]] merchant [[Nym]] in [[Dorn's Deep]].
